name.baseName: Shale gas production;Site preparation stage;Pad construction
页岩气生产;场地准备阶段;井垫建设

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The data set represents the pad construction phase during the site preparation for shale gas production. This specific process is applicable to the industry involving the extraction of shale gas, focusing on the initial steps required to prepare the site for drilling and future extraction. Typically, this involves the construction of a stable platform or 'pad' which serves as a foundation for the drilling rig and associated equipment. This data set is relevant for companies and entities dealing with shale gas operations in the Sichuan and Chongqing regions of China.
该数据集代表页岩气生产过程中场地准备阶段的井垫建设。这一特定过程适用于涉及页岩气提取的行业，重点是准备钻探和未来提取所需的初始步骤。通常，这涉及建设一个稳定的平台或‘垫’，作为钻井设备和相关设备的基础。该数据集与在中国四川和重庆地区从事页岩气作业的公司和实体相关。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: 原始数据时间介于2014-2016之间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: China's shale gas extraction work is currently concentrated in the Sichuan and Chongqing areas, and the data from Sichuan and Chongqing are selected for LCA calculations.
我国页岩气开采工作目前集中在四川及重庆地区，选取四川及重庆的数据进行LCA计算。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents the pad construction phase during the site preparation for shale gas production. This specific process is applicable to the industry involving the extraction of shale gas, focusing on the initial steps required to prepare the site for drilling and future extraction. Typically, this involves the construction of a stable platform or 'pad' which serves as a foundation for the drilling rig and associated equipment. This data set is relevant for companies and entities dealing with shale gas operations in the Sichuan and Chongqing regions of China.
该数据集代表页岩气生产过程中场地准备阶段的井垫建设。这一特定过程适用于涉及页岩气提取的行业，重点是准备钻探和未来提取所需的初始步骤。通常，这涉及建设一个稳定的平台或‘垫’，作为钻井设备和相关设备的基础。该数据集与在中国四川和重庆地区从事页岩气作业的公司和实体相关。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Wang, J., Liu, M., McLellan, B. C., Tang, X. & Feng, L. Environmental impacts of shale gas development in China: A hybrid life cycle analysis. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 120, 38–45 (2017).
Wang, J., Liu, M., McLellan, B. C., Tang, X. & Feng, L. Environmental impacts of shale gas development in China: A hybrid life cycle analysis. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 120, 38–45 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: For life cycle assessment calculations, use the provided data set specifically for scenarios applicable to shale gas site preparation in Sichuan and Chongqing. Given the regional focus of the data, it is important to ensure its applicability to local geological and infrastructural conditions when using it in models. Users should consider the temporal relevance of the raw data from 2014-2016 and update it if necessary to reflect current practices. The pad construction stage is key to site stability and future production efficiency; thus, attention should be paid to accurate representation within the model. Exclude recycling processes, as this data set pertains to initial construction without consideration of end-of-life stages.

用于生命周期评估计算时，使用提供的数据集，特别适用于四川和重庆的页岩气场地准备场景。鉴于数据的地域焦点，使用模型时重要的是确保它适用于当地的地质和基础设施条件。用户应该考虑2014-2016年原始数据的时间相关性，并在有必要的情况下更新，以反映当前实践。井垫建设阶段是场地稳定和未来生产效率的关键；因此，在模型中应注意准确表示。排除回收过程，因为这个数据集涉及到初始建设，没有考虑到生命周期的最后阶段。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Gravel used in well site construction
场地准备阶段--井场建设所用碎石
场地准备阶段--井场建设设备及碎石等运输
场地准备阶段--建成井场的面积
